name: Super Quadrilateral Damage
description:
Originally a Ludum Dare 40 entry made in under 48 hours, Super Quadrilateral Damage is a chaotic bullet hell shoot 'em up, inspired by contemporary rogue-lites such as Nuclear Throne and Enter the Gungeon, set on just one screen.

The full imagining of the Ludum Dare entry brings a wealth of new features, from new enemy types and bosses to new characters, mechanics and modes. Enemies and bosses from the original release have been rebalanced to make the experience fresh, and graphics have been updated to improve the overall game feel!
